title: CY50112: Enzymes In Organic Synthesis - Quick Facts
text:

Course name | Enzymes In Organic Synthesis
Offered by | Chemistry
Credits | 3

Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisite: NilGeneral aspects of enzyme catalysed reactions; use of the following classes of enzymes in organic synthesis: hydrolases, oxidoreductases, aldolases and other C-C bond forming enzymes, glycosyl transferases, enzymes catalyzing addition, elimination and group transfer reactions.Book: C. H. Wong, and G. H. Whitesides, Enzymes in organic synthesis; Kurt Faber, Biotransformations in Organic Chemistry.
